title: Pixel 4A - Google Pay difficulties with NFC
content:
I like to to define my GOOGLE PAY problem more precisely:
Google Pixel 4a
Security Update  fm Oct 2020
Android 11 fm Sep 2020
It is impossible to pay with Google Pay.
NFC is on - Phone IS RESTING on card machine.
I get the following information with a red exclamation mark: "Smartphone moves to fast".
Google Pay ends up in endless loop and denial of pay request.
Swipe-movement ended up in the same result.
Cleared cache. Re-installed Google Pay. No Joy.
I kindly request some positive help or solutions. Tks.
